attributes.action: Allow the State visit by President Elect Trump.
attributes.additional_details: The UK will most likely get the go-ahead for Brexit, in which Obama stated once initiated the UK will be at the back of the list for trade deals,  Now we have President Elect Trump who has shown where he stands with Britain and will support the UK all the way by putting us at the front of the trade list,  which we need so Britain can safely get through Brexit. Blocking Trump will potentially cause Britain to come crashing down in the stages of Brexit. People think this is a game, IT'S NOT !!
attributes.background: Blocking a state visit from President Elect Trump could create a rocky and dangerous path for the people of the UK going through with Brexit,  America is a great trade asset to the UK blocking entry could prevent future deals and damage reputation,  We need America on our side not against us.
